Review the reconciliation process for general ledger accounts (e.g. suspense, miscellaneous, un-posted items, prepaid, loan, and, deposit accounts) for:
 

  • Significant or unusual activities or changes in account balances, and review other assets/liabilities to determine that all items are bankable.
  • Frequent entries at month end and quarter end (as this may be an attempt to circumvent bank reporting)
  • Look for patterns (e.g., the same customer making a reoccurring
    type of transaction).
  • Transactions of unusually large amounts
